title: Reborn as the Hero’s Daughter! Time to Become the Hero Once More! (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Gender Bender   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Age Progression   Arrogant Characters   Assassins   Child Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Cute Protagonist   Doting Parents   Elves   Famous Parents   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heterochromia   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Kidnappings   Magic   Male to Female   Nobles   R-15   Reincarnation   Royalty   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Unique Weapons   Weak to Strong
author: Kaburagi Haruka   鏑木ハルカ
description:
One of the six people called heroes, Reid, fought alone against the Devil, and ended up dead.

After meeting with a suspicious god, he woke up again and found out he has born again as a baby.

Moreover, as a daughter of his former companions.

In order to regain his former power, Reid/Nicole has to go through a life of hardships to reach the ideal he aims for.>
